name: Turo’s Andrew Mok: Balancing Data and Intuition

# Turo’s Andrew Mok: Balancing Data and Intuition

In this episode of Twilio's Builders Wanted podcast, Andrew Mok, Chief Marketing Officer of Turo, discusses balancing data and human insights, stopping the scroll, and dogfooding your product.
